note2:
If you want to auto harvest the vegetable of other mod
1.launch ck.open target other mod. find target vegetable form. maybe this vegetable is \"activator\" or \"flora\" or \"tree\" category. refrain from id. exit ck.
2.launch ck again. open the towHarvest.esp and target mod\'s esp. set towHarvest as active file.
3.if get an error, please push \"yes to all\"
4.find \"aaatowHV_ITM__Mod__FLST\" in formlist category and open it.
5.keep open formlist, next step is find item prepared in 1.
6.if found, please drag and drop to formlist.
7.save and exit the ck.
8.set the masterfile\"target other mod\" to the towHarvest.esp. I used wrye bash.
this is all I can explain. more than this is hard to explain, because my english.
in this regard, please let me know if you do have a easy-to-understand text.

??~
